Cherrycake\Modules\CacheProviderInterfacePool

Additional interface for all cache providers that additionally implement Pool functionalities

    Synopsis

    interface CacheProviderInterfacePool {
    • // methods
    • public bool poolAdd()
    • public mixed poolPop()
    • public bool isInPool()
    }

    Methods

    public

    • isInPool() — Checks whether a value is stored or not in the pool.
    • poolAdd() — Stores a value in a cache pool
    • poolPop() — Gets a random value from the pool and removes it
